channel.title: First Baptist Church Muncie Indiana
channel.description: Sermons from First Baptist Church Muncie Indiana
channel.itunes:author: Wade Allen
channel.itunes:subtitle: Sermons from First Baptist Church Muncie Indiana
channel.itunes:summary: This podcast includes sermons from First Baptist Church in Muncie, Indiana.

item.title: Rooted in Love
item.description: On Mother’s Day, we will be studying Ephesians 3:14-21. As Paul prays for the church, he desires that they be rooted in the love of God. While God’s love is incomprehensible, we can experience it. And as it makes it wa...

item.title: Mystery Unraveled

item.title: Broken and Poured Out

item.title: Hearts Follow Treasure
item.description: Jesus instructs us to be careful where we place our stockpiles, our treasures. He instructs us to build them in eternal places. As we do so, our hearts will gravitate toward those places. Matthew 6:19-21

item.title: Giving God Credit

item.title: Orphans in China
item.description: Katy Kessler, a student at Ball State, will be sharing about her experience this summer. She is an occupational therapy major who worked in an orphanage in China this summer. She will be sharing her story in worship.
item.itunes:author: Katy Kessler

item.title: A Closing Scene
